lines.text:
* When isolated, the artifact
  maintains complete stillness
* No vibrations, no temperature
  fluctuation, no detectable emissions

* Interaction begins only when a
  pattern is broken in its presence

* Misaligned tiles, mismatched
  footsteps, sentences left
  unfinished-these seem to "provoke"
  it

* Response manifests as correction.
  The environment, or the subject,
  is altered to restore symmetry

* Correction is instantaneous. It is
  also irreversible

* Initial exposure resulted in an
  unusual emotional response among
  staff

* Test subjects displayed an
  overwhelming desire to protect
  one another

* Several refused to leave the chamber
  without the others

* Conclusion: Contact alters empathy
  to extreme degrees

* Initial trials were halted after
  multiple staff reported distressing
  internal dialogues

* The artifact posed deeply personal
  questions to each observer

* Several team members resigned,
  citing inability to 'unhear'
  the responses

* Conclusion: Prolonged contact risks
  severe cognitive dissonance
